Meta.title: Socket Punch
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
此mod提供了一个物品[开孔工具]用其可在[枪身加工机]与武器合成, 为其增加改造槽 优质装备槽位上限默认为4 奇迹装备槽位上限默认为5 神器装备槽位上限默认为6 黑星装备槽位上限默认为2 默认无法为不含有任何改造槽的装备开孔 默认无法为衣服鞋子等非武器装备开孔 [打孔工具]配方在[诺拉]处出售
在BepInEx配置内 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg") 允许你调整: 打孔槽位上限 是否允许为无孔武器开孔 是否允许为非武器装备附魔
注意: 目前, 如果将此mod排在最后可能会无法加载, 同时导致汉化文本失效 可以尝试上调mod排序来解决问题, 或是订阅我的另一个mod Elona+ Astral Light Pen id=3382379925 将mod排序调整为 ...其他mod Socket Punch Elona+ Astral Light Pen 结尾(或是其他更多mod) 也有可能解决问题
This mod provides an item [socket punch], which can be used with the [barrel processing machine] to combine with weapons and add modification slots. The maximum slot limit for Superior equipment is set to 4 by default. The maximum slot limit for Legendary equipment is set to 5 by default. The maximum slot limit for Mythical equipment is set to 6 by default. The maximum slot limit for Artifact equipment is set to 2 by default. By default, socketing for equipment without any modification slots is not allowed. By default, socketing for non-weapon equipment like clothes and shoes is not allowed. The [socket punch] recipe is sold by [Nola].
In the BepInEx configuration file (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.equipmodify.cfg") you can adjust the following: Maximum socket slot limit Whether to allow socketing for weapons without sockets Whether to allow socketing for non-weapon equipment
Warning: Currently, placing this mod at the end may prevent it from loading and cause the localization text to become invalid. You can try moving this mod up in the load order to solve the issue Or subscribe to my other mod Elona+ Astral Light Pen (id=3382379925). Adjusting the mod order to: ...other mods Socket Punch Elona+ Astral Light Pen End(or more other mods) may also resolve the issue.
